public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> update(@RequestBody

        Update curriculum's id, name, isActive, isCore, skills parameters. If request is null, return status 400 - bad request Check request for constraint violations If the request doesn't return any violations, return status 201 - created If the request violates a constraint, return violation message If the request doesn't fit the parameters, it returns status 400 - bad request
